page.title: 10FOOD FOR ONE DAY
page.content:
The amount and type of food we eat vary greatly. A study by six year olds have measured how much food each child ate in one day. The study was done by l9 children on Tuesday 2nd July l985, and has included all food and drink for the whole day. {RESULTS} Savoury Snacks 24 Puddings 12 Cold Drinks 35 Bread 24 Vegatables 24 Cereals 17 Meat 15 Hot Drink 14 Potatoes 12 Fruit 11 Sweets ll Cakes 9 Sweet Snacks 10 Ice Cream 9 Eggs 2
From their survey the group established they ate a lot of sweet snack type foods, although most had a hot meal containing meat and vegatables during the day.
